input_text:
Job Title: Mechanical Engineer

Location: Charlotte, NC

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Dice is the leading career destination for tech experts at every stage of their careers. Our client, Jobot, is seeking the following. Apply via Dice today!

Full-Time & Direct Hire needed for leading provider of high-quality forklifts and material handling equipment!

This Jobot Job is hosted by: James Thai

Are you a fit? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply Now" button and sending us your resume.

Salary: $90,000 - $120,000 per year

A bit about us:

Based in Charlotte, North Carolina, we stand as a premier supplier of top-notch forklifts and cutting-edge material handling equipment! With a commitment to excellence and customer satisfaction, we offer a wide range of products designed to optimize productivity and enhance operational efficiency. Backed by a team of experts and a dedication to innovation, our company continues to set the standard for quality and performance in the material handling industry.

Title: Mechanical Engineer

Location: Charlotte, NC 28217

Salary: $90,000 - $120,000

Why join us?

 Competitive base salary: $90,000 - $120,000 Full benefits: Medical, Dental, Vision 401 (K) with generous company match Generous Paid time off (PTO) Vacation, sick, and paid holidays Life Insurance coverage

Job Details

 Design and enhance mechanical components and systems tailored for material handling and logistics equipment. Validate technical feasibility and coordinate integration with electronic and software counterparts. Collaborate with various teams within HC Forklift America to facilitate smooth project implementation. Spearhead prototype development, conduct thorough testing, and oversee validation procedures. Create and uphold comprehensive technical documentation adhering to industry and company standards. Efficiently manage project schedules, resources, and outcomes, ensuring excellence and innovation.

Qualifications:

 Bachelor's degree in Mechanical Engineering or a relevant field 3-5 years of mechanical engineering experience, ideally in the material handling or a related sector.

Interested in hearing more? Easy Apply now by clicking the "Apply Now" button.

Experience Level (if available): Entry level
